title: The Sparky Points
content:
ikes like lightning bolts?"

The Sparky Points Information

Electric Blood: When the wielder deals damage using this weapon, they gain 2 Lighting Charges Range: 1.5m

The Sparky Points Location & Where to Find

Quest: Reward of Rescue the Grand Duke (Waukeen's Rest, other 2 possible rewards are The Joltshooter and The Spellsparkler)

The Sparky Points Notes & Tips

Rarity: Rare Value: 250 Weight: 1.8 ID: cfdc8fdc-9f59-415f-8098-70035585eadb
